import MKBox from"components/MKBox";import MKTypography from"components/MKTypography";import MKInput from"components/MKInput";import MKButton from"components/MKButton";// Images
import macbook from"assets/images/macbook.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Newsletter(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKBox,{component:"section",pt:6,my:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,alignItems:"center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{item:true,sx:12,md:6,sx:{ml:{xs:0,lg:3},mb:{xs:12,md:0}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{variant:"h4",children:"Be the first to see the news"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKTypography,{variant:"body2",color:"text",mb:3,children:"Your company may not be in the software business, but eventually, a software company will be in your business."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:1,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:8,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKInput,{type:"email",label:"Email Here...",fullWidth:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKButton,{variant:"gradient",color:"info",sx:{height:"100%"},children:"Subscribe"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:12,md:5,sx:{ml:"auto"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKBox,{position:"relative",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MKBox,{component:"img",src:macbook,alt:"macbook",width:"100%"})})})]})})});}export default Newsletter;
